EmailTemplate.name: ATS Case transfer to Plymouth
EmailTemplate.subject: ATS Case transfer to Plymouth Team
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Customer,
Thank you for contacting Aerospace Technical Support.
Thank you for your email requesting assistance with one of our Plymouth Products. To ensure your issue is resolved as quickly as possible, we forwarded your information to our Plymouth Team at PlymouthSupport@honeywell.com. An expert from that team will contact you very soon to resolve your question.
For future questions about Plymouth Products, feel free to contact the team at PlymouthSupport@honeywell.com. For other technical support requests, visit www.aerospace.honeywell.com.
Have a Great Day.
